div.div:
ğ‘‡>ğ‘‡ğ‘âŸ¹ğ‘‡â†’âˆ T > T_cÂ \implies T \to \infty when ğœ‰=0 \xiÂ =0 Â (Disordered)
ğ‘‡<ğ‘‡ğ‘âŸ¹ğ‘‡â†’0 T < T_c \implies T \to 0 when ğœ‰=0 \xi = 0 (Ordered)Â
